name: Invincible (FlamingSparrow)
description:
Please Use Fullscreen!

Welcome to Invincible! The goal of this game is to kill the hero by clicking on various gadgets and traps spread across the lair. Use them to effectively kill them. 

Controls : Just clicking on objects (R to restart)

Music : Scowsh
Artist : Teshia

Disclaimer:

This was probably one of my most rushed games and it encountered tons of roadblocks on the way so i'm proud that I was able to submit something to this jam.
